mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_payment_history (user_id, class_id, payment_date, price, refund_status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{classId}, NOW(), #{price}, #{refundStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT uph.payment_id AS paymentId, uph.user_id AS userId, uph.class_id AS classId, c.class_title AS classTitle, uph.price, uph.refund_status AS refundStatus, f.file_url AS fileUrl FROM user_payment_history uph JOIN class c ON uph.class_id = c.class_id JOIN file f ON f.file_no = c.file_no WHERE uph.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY uph.payment_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE user_payment_history SET refund_status = #{refundStatus} WHERE payment_id = #{paymentId}
